lyrics:
49 contributorstomorrow lyricsverse 1
today is the day ill learn that i believe in miracles
i can feel the world opening up i think i broke the curse
no i wont grab you by the arm when you go
no one can give me what i want yeah i know

chorus
lets get out of this hopeless town town
nobody can stop us now now
and times on our side while our hearts are young
lets think about it tomorrow now

verse 2
daddy said he needed money so he put her on the street street
she had just turned thirteen got a family to feed feed
yeah we grew up in a hurry thats when she met me
daddy got a little worried american dream

bridge
ooh ooh ooh
come on lets go well think about it tomorrow
come on lets go well think about it tomorrow

chorus
lets get out of this hopeless town ohoh ohoh
nobody can stop us now ohoh ohoh
and times on our side while our hearts are young
lets think about it tomorrow

nobody can stop us now ohoh ohoh
